problem_text_cn: 如图,正方形ABCD的边长为8,M在DC上,且DM=2,N是AC上一动点,则DN+MN的最小值为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the edge length of the square ABCD is N_0, M is on DC, and DM = N_1, N is the last moving point of AC, then the minimum value of DN + MN is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图,连接BM,∵点B和点D关于直线AC对称,∴NB=ND,则BM就是DN+MN的最小值,∵正方形ABCD的边长是8,DM=2,∴CM=6,∴BM=l^{2}×|➝{ZL}|^{2}=|➝{ZL}|^{2}=10,∴DN+MN的最小值是10．故选:D．
